body.p: Suppose there are four 500-MB hard drives plus one 2-GB flash drive. What is the total capacity, in gigabytes, of this hardware?

response.feedback: 2 GB of hard drive capacity plus 2 GB of flash drive capacity is 4 GB total.

part.hint: Four 500 MB hard drives is 2000 MB.
2 GB of hard drive capacity plus 2 GB of flash drive capacity is 4 GB total.
